PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-06392012-05-17,  ,  ,  ,  HC, 
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (1635 – Food Additives)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (1635 – FOOD ADDITIVES) in order to (1) enable new uses for the sweeteners acesulfame-potassium and sucralose in canned fruit as well as in pickles and relishes; (2) address an inconsistency in the terminology used in the French version of Table IX to section B.16.100 of the Regulations that was raised by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations; (3) correct inconsistencies between the English and the French versions, as well as spelling errors and (4) add clarity and consistency to the expressions used to describe certain foods in several Tables.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0104 Publication Date: 2012-06-06
AttachmentsAttachment
